title: Me On You
lyrics:
I just want you
Excuse me, I've fallen way too far
And I just want you, yeah
My body sound truth
Fed up my body, it's making our heart trail proof
Yeah



Baby, let me lose myself in you tonight

Cause I've been waiting so damn long to get to you

Nothing's ever failing me, makes you and I

You got me faded, intoxicated-cated

Putting me on you

Putting me on you



Something 'bout you

That makes me breathe every act to the way you move

Yeah

I wanna taste you

This skin is my liquor and this blood is over you

Yeah



And I just wanna lose myself in you tonight

Cause I've been waiting so damn long to get to you

Nothing's ever failing me, makes you and I

You got me faded, intoxicated-cated

Putting me on you

Putting me on you

Putting me on you



Babe, you already lose myself in you tonight

Cause I've been waiting so damn long to get to you

Nothing's ever failing me, makes you and I

You got me faded, intoxicated



I've been waiting so damn long to get to you

Putting me on you

Putting me on you

Putting me on you

Putting me on you
